quest.name: In Memory of Moenbryda
journal: Minfilia wishes to gather the Scions and honor the fallen Moenbryda.

Wishing to hold a simple service to honor the fallen Moenbryda, Minfilia suggests a gathering at the nearby monument─a stone sacred to Thaliak, the guardian deity of Sharlayan. Travel to Rathefrost in Mor Dhona, and wait at the mark of the Scholar for the other Scions to arrive.

You kneel before the mark of the Scholar, and offer a prayer for Moenbryda's soul. Now, more than ever, the Scions are determined to bring an end to the Ascians' destructive crusade. Return to the Rising Stones and speak with Minfilia.

Though her resolve threatens to crumble under the weight of yet another companion lost, Minfilia reminds herself of her duty to the fallen. She cannot surrender to her grief while Eorzea remains besieged on all sides. The Scions look to their leader for strength, and the Antecedent, in turn, confesses her reliance upon you. With the myriad perils yet menacing the realm, she will yet have need of your steadfast presence...
objectives: Show your respects at the mark of the Scholar at Rathefrost.
Speak with Minfilia at the Rising Stones.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: As Moenbryda was a native of Sharlayan, I feel it is only fitting that we gather before the mark of the Scholar. Are you familiar with the stone?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: 'Tis a monument found at Rathefrost, and is sacred to Thaliak, guardian deity of the city of learning.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: There shall we pray for our dear friend's soul, and bid her a peaceful return to the light of the Mothercrystal.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Oh, Moen... I miss you so much already...

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: She was counting on the theory that a soul's aether burns brightest at the moment of its passing. A scholar until the very end...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text:
Would we had arrived a few moments sooner...
Just a few moments...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Our list of grievances against the Ascians was already overlong. Must they continue to add to it?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: I don't want to believe she's really gone...

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: The loss of those close to you is never easy...and Yda was closer to Moenbryda than most.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: As ever, I was a step too late...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Was there aught we might have done to save her? 'Tis foolish to torture oneself with such thoughts, but the heart is ofttimes deaf to quiet reason.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Moenbryda showed us the way forward at the cost of her own life. What worth is her sacrifice if we do not follow where it leads?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Let us gather at Rathefrost, and show our respects for our fallen comrade. Then we shall continue with the work she began...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: I don't feel much like talking at the moment. If you could just...give me some time.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: I loathe to see Yda in such pain, but I have not the words to comfort her. Can you imagine it? I, Papalymo, the one who has an eloquent comment for every situation, am at a loss for words...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: We must find some means of protecting ourselves from Ascian intrusions. There must be a way...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The Rising Stones feels somehow colder. Moenbryda always carried with her such an abundance of warmth and cheer.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Though we have said our farewells, the pall of sadness has diminished but little. Forgive me: as Antecedent, 'tis my job to be the pillar of strength for all others to lean upon.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Yet I also believe the grief we feel now is precious in its own way, and not to be lightly swept aside. Do you not agree, Forename?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: 'Tis as if a dagger has been thrust into my breast...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: But 'tis a pain we must learn to bear if we are to forge ahead with our duty.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The battles we have fought have taken the lives of so many. Louisoix. Moenbryda. Our fellows at the Waking Sands.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Their spirit and dedication to our cause, however, will never be lost as long as we rise to fight once more.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I hardly need remind you of this, of course. 'Tis for my own benefit that I repeat these words─a reaffirmation of mine own chosen path.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: If I do not rebuild the foundation of my resolve, I am like to collapse in a fit of weeping...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: My apologies again, Forename─there is no other to whom I could display such weakness.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: You are my pillar of strength, and I fear I shall have need of your steadfast presence in the days to come...
